name: Boids (Lvl3Mage)
description:
Boids is a short prototype I made that involves controlling a flock of boids. There really isn't a goal, it's just fun to fly around and control a whole flock of boids while evading obstacles or fighting other boids.

Controls:

- Use the mouse to pan around the camera

- Use F and G keys to spawn boids

- Press space to activate the boid flock power
